value.string:
node_uid
 query
 omit_input
 omit_output
 resource_uid:list
 from_date
 to_date
 at_date
 transaction_simulation_state:list
 transaction_section_category
 payment_uid
 no_payment_uid
 mirror_section_uid
 no_mirror_section_uid

SELECT
 SUM(ROUND(stock.quantity,2)) AS quantity,
 SUM(ROUND(stock.total_price,2)) AS total_price
 FROM
 movement,
 stock,
 catalog as child,
 catalog AS section_c,
 catalog AS section_bc, -- XXX probably not necessary
 category AS section_membership,
 catalog AS section
 <dtml-if query>
 , category
 </dtml-if>
 WHERE stock.node_uid = <dtml-var node_uid>
 AND child.uid = stock.uid
 AND movement.uid = stock.uid
 AND child.portal_type <> 'Simulation Movement'
 AND movement.is_accountable = 1
 <dtml-if resource_uid>
 AND (
 <dtml-in resource_uid>
 movement.resource_uid = <dtml-sqlvar sequence-item type="int"><dtml-if sequence-end><dtml-else> OR </dtml-if>
 </dtml-in>
 )
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if from_date>
 AND stock.date >= <dtml-sqlvar from_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if at_date>
 AND stock.date <= <dtml-sqlvar at_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if to_date>
 AND stock.date < <dtml-sqlvar to_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if omit_input>
 AND stock.total_price > 0.0
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if omit_output>
 AND stock.total_price < 0.0
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if payment_uid>
 AND stock.payment_uid = <dtml-sqlvar payment_uid type="int">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if no_payment_uid>
 AND stock.payment_uid IS NULL
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if mirror_section_uid>
 AND stock.mirror_section_uid = <dtml-sqlvar mirror_section_uid type="int">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if no_mirror_section_uid>
 AND stock.mirror_section_uid IS NULL
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if transaction_simulation_state>
 AND (
 <dtml-in transaction_simulation_state>
 stock.simulation_state = <dtml-sqlvar sequence-item type="string"><dtml-if sequence-end><dtml-else> OR </dtml-if>
 </dtml-in>
 )
 <dtml-else>
 AND stock.simulation_state != 'cancelled' 
 AND stock.simulation_state != 'draft' 
 </dtml-if>
 AND section.uid = stock.section_uid
 <dtml-if transaction_section_category>
 AND section_c.relative_url = <dtml-sqlvar transaction_section_category type="string">
 </dtml-if>
 AND section_membership.category_uid = section_c.uid
 AND section_membership.base_category_uid = section_bc.uid
 AND section_membership.uid = section.uid
 AND section.portal_type = 'Organisation'
 <dtml-if query>
 AND category.uid = stock.section_uid
 AND <dtml-var query>
 </dtml-if>

SELECT
 SUM(ROUND(stock.quantity,2)) AS quantity,
 SUM(ROUND(stock.total_price,2)) AS total_price
 FROM
 movement,
 stock,
 catalog as child,
 catalog AS section_c,
 catalog AS section_bc, -- XXX probably not necessary
 category AS section_membership,
 catalog AS section
 <dtml-if query>
 , category
 </dtml-if>
 WHERE stock.node_uid = <dtml-var node_uid>
 AND child.uid = stock.uid
 AND movement.uid = stock.uid
 AND child.portal_type <> 'Simulation Movement'
 AND movement.is_accountable = 1
 <dtml-if resource_uid>
 AND (
 <dtml-in resource_uid>
 movement.resource_uid = <dtml-sqlvar sequence-item type="int"><dtml-if sequence-end><dtml-else> OR </dtml-if>
 </dtml-in>
 )
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if from_date>
 AND stock.date >= <dtml-sqlvar from_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if at_date>
 AND stock.date <= <dtml-sqlvar at_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if to_date>
 AND stock.date < <dtml-sqlvar to_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if omit_input>
 AND stock.total_price > 0.0
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if omit_output>
 AND stock.total_price < 0.0
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if payment_uid>
 AND stock.payment_uid = <dtml-sqlvar payment_uid type="int">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if no_payment_uid>
 AND stock.payment_uid IS NULL
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if mirror_section_uid>
 AND stock.mirror_section_uid = <dtml-sqlvar mirror_section_uid type="int">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if no_mirror_section_uid>
 AND stock.mirror_section_uid IS NULL
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if transaction_simulation_state>
 AND (
 <dtml-in transaction_simulation_state>
 stock.simulation_state = <dtml-sqlvar sequence-item type="string"><dtml-if sequence-end><dtml-else> OR </dtml-if>
 </dtml-in>
 )
 <dtml-else>
 AND stock.simulation_state != 'cancelled' 
 AND stock.simulation_state != 'draft' 
 </dtml-if>
 AND section.uid = stock.section_uid
 <dtml-if transaction_section_category>
 AND section_c.relative_url = <dtml-sqlvar transaction_section_category type="string">
 </dtml-if>
 AND section_membership.category_uid = section_c.uid
 AND section_membership.base_category_uid = section_bc.uid
 AND section_membership.uid = section.uid
 AND section.portal_type = 'Organisation'
 <dtml-if query>
 AND category.uid = stock.section_uid
 AND <dtml-var query>
 </dtml-if>
